actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to direct the Corps of Engineers to study the feasibility of modifying the Mississippi River Project at Tiptonville, Tennessee.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army, through the Chief of Engineers, to study and report to Congress on the feasibility of modifying a Mississippi River flood control project to increase the flood protection for Tiptonville, Tennessee.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Corps of Engineers to study the feasibility of modifying the Mississippi River Project at Tiptonville, Tennessee.
